name: Rest and hydration
description: Adequate rest and fluid intake to support recovery.

name: Steam inhalation
description: Inhaling steam to relieve nasal congestion.

name: Bed rest
description: Resting in bed to reduce body strain during illness.

name: Oxygen therapy
description: Supplemental oxygen for patients with breathing difficulty.

name: Breathing exercises
description: Exercises to strengthen lungs and improve airflow.

name: Isolation
description: Separating infected patients to prevent disease spread.

name: Cold compress
description: Applying cold packs to relieve migraine pain.

name: Oral rehydration solution (ORS)
description: Fluid replacement therapy to prevent dehydration.
